title: Quadratic Equations Practice
description: Solve 20 quadratic equations using various methods including factoring and the quadratic formula.

title: Shakespeare Essay
description: Write a 1000-word essay analyzing the themes in Romeo and Juliet. Focus on the theme of fate versus free will.

title: Cell Structure Lab Report
description: Complete the lab report on plant and animal cell observation using microscopes. Include labeled diagrams.

title: World War I Timeline
description: Create a detailed timeline of major events during World War I with explanations of significance.

title: Chemical Reactions Lab
description: Conduct three chemical reactions and document observations, balanced equations, and reaction types.

title: Fitness Assessment
description: Complete all fitness tests including push-ups, sit-ups, mile run, and flexibility measurements.

title: Algebra Review Test
description: Comprehensive test covering all algebra topics from the semester including linear equations and inequalities.

title: Poetry Analysis
description: Choose three poems from the provided list and analyze their literary devices and themes.
